statements: UPDATE stock_prices SET close_price = 500.75, open_price = 495.50 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-20';
UPDATE stock_prices SET high_price = 510.20, low_price = 490.30 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date = '2022-10-21';
UPDATE stock_prices SET close_price = 100.00, high_price = 110.50 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2021-08-10';
UPDATE stock_prices SET open_price = 105.25, low_price = 95.75 WHERE date = '2021-08-12' AND symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE stocks SET open=100, close=110 WHERE symbol='AAPL';
UPDATE stock_data SET price=120.50, source_link='http://example.com' WHERE symbol='GOOGL';
UPDATE stocks SET open = 100.25, close = 105.50 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE stock_data SET price = 115.75, source_link = 'https://example.com/aapl' WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE stock_prices SET open_price = 1500.75, close_price = 1520.45 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE stock_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Positive trend' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND analysis_date = '2022-10-20';
UPDATE stock_prices SET open_price = 200.50, close_price = 205.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE stock_trends SET trend_type = 'Bullish', start_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE StockPrices SET open_price = 1500.00, close_price = 1550.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-08-10';
UPDATE AnalystRecommendations SET recommendation = 'Buy' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND analyst_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE StockPrices SET open_price = 1000, high_price = 1050, low_price = 980, close_price = 1020 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-01';
UPDATE StockAnalysis SET trend = 'Bearish', notes = 'Potential downtrend in the market' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND analysis_date = '2022-09-30';
UPDATE stock_prices SET close_price = 150.25, high_price = 155.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-09-30';
UPDATE stock_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Positive' WHERE symbol_id = 101 AND trend_id = 3 AND date = '2022-10-01';
UPDATE stock_prices SET close_price = close_price - 10, high_price = high_price + 5 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-20';
UPDATE stock_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Bullish Trend', date = '2022-10-20' WHERE symbol_id = 1 AND trend_id = 3
